author: nicolaken
msg: Add a new rule: all *.html files in the xdocs dir will be used as source files.
This supercedes the *.ihtml rule, that will remain for now for compatibility.

msg: Add .html matcher as new way of defining ihtml pages.

author: crossley
msg: Do not need the catalog DTD anymore, because resolver has its own
bootstrapping to deal with this Catch-22.
